title: Streamlining Task Management and Scheduling
challenge: Existing to-do list and scheduling apps lacked the combined functionality I needed. Managing my tasks across multiple tools was inefficient and frustrating.
features: Integrated Brainstorming & Prioritization:  Intuitive to-do list creation with seamless drag-and-drop sorting for easy prioritization.
Flexible Scheduling: Schedule tasks with precise start and end times or set all-day events. 'Past Due' reminders promote accountability.
Organized Task Management:  Tasks are automatically categorized ('Past Due', 'Unscheduled,' 'Scheduled,' 'Completed') for streamlined workflow and progress tracking.
result: As my first React project, Ajenda challenged me across multiple areas of web development, from front-end logic to back-end integration. Overcoming these hurdles significantly deepened my understanding of full-stack development and the value of persistence in the face of complex projects.  Through dedicated research and iteration, I aimed to create a user-friendly and intuitive experience. Ajenda now serves as a powerful portfolio piece, demonstrating my ability to learn new technologies quickly and translate ideas into functional web applications.
